changeSet.ext:documentation: Adding events to the created checks to support monitoring.
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO "event" (check_id, "created", "timestamp", status, message) SELECT c.id AS check_id, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'), event_time, (ARRAY ['OK','OK','OK','OK','OK','OK','OK','OK','WARNING','CRITICAL'])[round(random() * 9) + 1] as "check_result", 'This is a random message for the event occurring at ' || event_time FROM generate_series((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') - INTERVAL '2 WEEK', (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'), '30 SECOND'::interval) as event_time JOIN "check" AS c ON c.name IN ( 'Server CPU', 'Server Memory', 'Server Disk', 'Server Network' ) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;
